Package src

Class RMIServer

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
src.RMIServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
RMIServerInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class RMIServer extends UnicastRemoteObject implements RMIServerInterface
A classe RMIServer representa um servidor RMI que permite indexar URLs e pesquisar links. Implementa a interface RMIServerInterface.
See Also:
